description.@en: Blinding flames of retribution strike down at your foes, causing them to burn like human candles!

criticalFailure.@en: Your words betray you; you are nothing more than a false avatar! Condemned by the gods, you immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril. In addition, you lose 1 AP on your next Turn and are set On Fire.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist and are also set On Fire.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Providing you can see your foes, each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril. In addition, they must Resist with a Resolve Test or lose 1 AP on their next Turn.

reagents.@en: A religious condemnation, written upon paper (expended)
